themes: lack of visibility in arts and cultural spaces
unclear pathways to information about grants
suggestions for targeted outreach in public venues
key_phrases: all of these programs should be advertised better
I've never seen anything about grants
unsure how anyone would find these grants unless they went out of their way to visit the cities website
should be advertised in spaces like the Alamo or Austin Film Society during the previews
cultural centers should have information on display within their lobbies
barriers_identified: lack of advertising in physical arts spaces
information only available on the city's website
solutions_proposed: advertise grant opportunities in galleries and arts spaces
display information at cultural centers' lobbies when deadlines approach
promote grants at venues like the Alamo or Austin Film Society during previews
